TopicTitle: Game Crashes on Startup - Access Violation

Articles.Content:
I played for a few hours yesterday with no problems but when I tried to start the game today (through steam) I got an error message.

Crash Dump

Hi adpen12, it looks like you need to either plugin the laptop (if it is a laptop) and enable performance mode in your power settings, or you need to reinstall your graphics driver, as KSP says it's missing.

Initialize engine version: 4.6.4f1 (99f88340878d)

GfxDevice: creating device client; threaded=1

d3d: no support for this device type (accelerated/ref)

D3D9 initialization failed

GfxDevice: creating device client; threaded=1

d3d11: failed to create D3D11 device (0x887a0004)

D3D11 initialization failed

D3D9/D3D11 initialization failed, trying OpenGL

GfxDevice: creating device client; threaded=1

OpenGL:

Version: OpenGL 1.1 [1.1.0]

Renderer: GDI Generic

Vendor: Microsoft Corporation

VRAM: 3072 MB (via DXGI)

Extensions: GL_WIN_swap_hint GL_EXT_bgra GL_EXT_paletted_texture

Crash!!!

Don't forget to reboot your PC after installing a driver.

Also if you have a lot of open programs, try closing down anything you aren't using.
